content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create collection strategy trait in mcp/src/app_tools/support/collection_strategy.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating collection strategy trait
Create generic listing handler in mcp/src/app_tools/support/generic_listing_handler.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating generic handler
Implement BevyAppsStrategy in collection_strategy.rs for standard Bevy apps with build info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing BevyAppsStrategy
Implement BrpAppsStrategy in collection_strategy.rs for BRP-enabled apps with brp_enabled flag
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing BrpAppsStrategy
Implement BevyExamplesStrategy in collection_strategy.rs for examples without build info
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing BevyExamplesStrategy
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings and fix any issues
Replace brp_list_bevy_apps.rs handler with 3-line function calling generic handler with BevyAppsStrategy
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after replacing Bevy apps handler
Replace brp_list_brp_apps.rs handler with 3-line function calling generic handler with BrpAppsStrategy
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after replacing BRP apps handler
Replace brp_list_bevy_examples.rs handler with 3-line function calling generic handler with BevyExamplesStrategy
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after replacing Bevy examples handler
Update mcp/src/app_tools/support/mod.rs to export new generic handler and collection strategies
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating module exports
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings and fix any issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes - focus on identifying duplication, complexity, and validation that the implementation plan was actually implemented
When the code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
